PassiveDesc.Name: Slash Mastery
PassiveDesc.Desc: Slash Dice Power +1

PassiveDesc.Name: Pierce Mastery
PassiveDesc.Desc: Pierce Dice Power +1

PassiveDesc.Name: Blunt Mastery
PassiveDesc.Desc: Blunt Dice Power +1

PassiveDesc.Name: Speed
PassiveDesc.Desc: Speed Dice Slot +1 (Cannot Overlap)

PassiveDesc.Name: Ranged Only
PassiveDesc.Desc: Can only use Ranged Combat Pages

PassiveDesc.Name: Ranged
PassiveDesc.Desc: Can use Ranged Combat Pages

PassiveDesc.Name: Speed Ⅱ
PassiveDesc.Desc: Speed Dice Slot +2 (Cannot Overlap)

PassiveDesc.Name: Speed Ⅲ
PassiveDesc.Desc: Speed Dice Slot +1. Gain an additional Speed die at Emotion Level 3. (Cannot Overlap)

PassiveDesc.Name: Half-baked Courage
PassiveDesc.Desc: When an ally dies, gain 1 Strength next Scene

PassiveDesc.Name: Yun’s Hunch
PassiveDesc.Desc: Boost the max value of Evade dice by +3 at a 50% chance

PassiveDesc.Name: The Art of Defense
PassiveDesc.Desc: Boost the max value of Defensive dice by +3 at a 25% chance

PassiveDesc.Name: Slash of a Grade 9 Fixer
PassiveDesc.Desc: 50% chance to boost Slash damage by +1

PassiveDesc.Name: Knock of a Grade 9 Fixer
PassiveDesc.Desc: 50% chance to boost Blunt damage by +1

PassiveDesc.Name: Thrust of a Grade 9 Fixer
PassiveDesc.Desc: 50% chance to boost Pierce damage by +1

PassiveDesc.Name: Electric Shock
PassiveDesc.Desc: On a successful attack, inflict 1 Paralysis at a 25% chance next Scene (Once per target per Scene)

PassiveDesc.Name: Hook
PassiveDesc.Desc: Upon defeating an enemy, gain 1 Strength next Scene

PassiveDesc.Name: Instant Cooking
PassiveDesc.Desc: Recover 10% HP upon defeating an enemy (Max. 12)

PassiveDesc.Name: Emergency Rations
PassiveDesc.Desc: Recover 2 HP at the start of each Scene

PassiveDesc.Name: Talent
PassiveDesc.Desc: Deal +1 Stagger damage against enemies with slower Speed

PassiveDesc.Name: Flaming Bat
PassiveDesc.Desc: 50% chance to inflict 1 Burn on a successful attack

PassiveDesc.Name: Penetration
PassiveDesc.Desc: 50% chance to boost Pierce damage by +1

PassiveDesc.Name: Downward Slash
PassiveDesc.Desc: 50% chance to boost Slash damage by +1

PassiveDesc.Name: Open Wound
PassiveDesc.Desc: Deal +1 damage against enemies with Bleed

PassiveDesc.Name: Keeping in Stride
PassiveDesc.Desc: Recover 1 HP upon winning a clash

PassiveDesc.Name: Keeping in Stride
PassiveDesc.Desc: Recover 1 HP upon winning a clash

PassiveDesc.Name: Calmness
PassiveDesc.Desc: On clash win, boost the max value of the next die by +3 at a 25% chance

PassiveDesc.Name: Zwei Swordsmanship Ⅰ
PassiveDesc.Desc: Slash Damage +1

PassiveDesc.Name: Zwei Swordsmanship Ⅱ
PassiveDesc.Desc: Slash Stagger Damage +1

PassiveDesc.Name: Your Shield
PassiveDesc.Desc: Defensive Dice Power +1

PassiveDesc.Name: Minimum Offense
PassiveDesc.Desc: Slash Stagger Damage +1

PassiveDesc.Name: Zwei Swordsmanship Ⅲ
PassiveDesc.Desc: Pierce Damage +2

PassiveDesc.Name: Margin
PassiveDesc.Desc: At the end of each Scene, restore 1 Light and draw 1 page if the hand is empty

PassiveDesc.Name: Best Choice
PassiveDesc.Desc: Recover 3 HP whenever the character discards a page

PassiveDesc.Name: In Times Like These!
PassiveDesc.Desc: If 3 or fewer pages are in-hand at the end of the Scene, gain 1 Strength next Scene

PassiveDesc.Name: Restfulness
PassiveDesc.Desc: Restore 1 Light at the end of a Scene if the character did not use any pages that Scene

PassiveDesc.Name: Deep Breaths
PassiveDesc.Desc: At the start of each Scene, restore 1 Light at a 25% chance

PassiveDesc.Name: Double Kick
PassiveDesc.Desc: Deal 1 damage to opponent upon winning a clash

PassiveDesc.Name: Punch to the Solar Plexus
PassiveDesc.Desc: Blunt Damage +2

PassiveDesc.Name: Slashing Prowess of a Grade 8 Fixer
PassiveDesc.Desc: Slash Stagger Damage +1

PassiveDesc.Name: Piercing Prowess of a Grade 8 Fixer
PassiveDesc.Desc: Pierce Stagger Damage +1

PassiveDesc.Name: Slashing Prowess of a Grade 7 Fixer
PassiveDesc.Desc: Slash Stagger Damage +2

PassiveDesc.Name: Piercing Prowess of a Grade 7 Fixer
PassiveDesc.Desc: Pierce Stagger Damage +2

PassiveDesc.Name: Axe Gang Spirit
PassiveDesc.Desc: Blunt Stagger Damage +1

PassiveDesc.Name: Double Axe
PassiveDesc.Desc: Slash Damage +2, Pierce Damage -1

PassiveDesc.Name: Smack the Weakness
PassiveDesc.Desc: Blunt Damage +3

PassiveDesc.Name: Remembrance
PassiveDesc.Desc: If an ally has died, gain 2 Strength at the end of each Scene.

PassiveDesc.Name: Concentration
PassiveDesc.Desc: Gain +1 Power for the first Scene

PassiveDesc.Name: Blind Fire
PassiveDesc.Desc: Gain +2 Power for the first Scene

PassiveDesc.Name: Snipe
PassiveDesc.Desc: Offensive dice gain +3 Power for the first Scene

PassiveDesc.Name: Guardian
PassiveDesc.Desc: At the start of the Act, three random allies gain 2 Protection.

PassiveDesc.Name: Light of Daybreak
PassiveDesc.Desc: On a successful hit, deal +1-2 Stagger damage if the target has Burn.

PassiveDesc.Name: Stigma Workshop Weaponry
PassiveDesc.Desc: When inflicting Burn using Combat Pages, apply +1 additional stack.

PassiveDesc.Name: Lone Fixer
PassiveDesc.Desc: At the end of each Scene, gain 3 Strength if no other allies are present.

PassiveDesc.Name: Passion
PassiveDesc.Desc: Gain Power by double the current Emotion Level (Up to Level 1).

PassiveDesc.Name: Bzzz Bzzz
PassiveDesc.Desc: At the start of the Act, inflict 1 Paralysis to three random enemies.

PassiveDesc.Name: Pzzt Pzzt
PassiveDesc.Desc: On a successful hit, deal 1-2 bonus damage if the target has Paralysis.

PassiveDesc.Name: Unstable Charge
PassiveDesc.Desc: At the end of each Scene, gain 1 Strength at a 50% chance next Scene

PassiveDesc.Name: Shimmering
PassiveDesc.Desc: At the start of each Scene, exhaust all pages in hand and deck; add new pages to hand. Their Cost becomes 0.

PassiveDesc.Name: The Power of Love
PassiveDesc.Desc: Upon winning an Act, revive the dead townspeople with 50% HP.

PassiveDesc.Name: Dernier Amour
PassiveDesc.Desc: If HP goes down to 50% or lower…

PassiveDesc.Name: Battle Ready
PassiveDesc.Desc: Draw 2 more pages at the start of the Act

PassiveDesc.Name: Dark Cloud Blade
PassiveDesc.Desc: Slash Dice Power +1

PassiveDesc.Name: Digging Shank
PassiveDesc.Desc: When inflicting Bleed using Combat Pages, apply +1 additional stack.

PassiveDesc.Name: Deep Wound
PassiveDesc.Desc: Upon winning a clash with Offensive dice, inflict 1 Bleed next Scene

PassiveDesc.Name: Razor Strike
PassiveDesc.Desc: Upon a successful Slash attack, inflict 1 Bleed next Scene

PassiveDesc.Name: Meow Meow~
PassiveDesc.Desc: At the start of the Act, give 1 Strength to two random allies

PassiveDesc.Name: Improv Drumming
PassiveDesc.Desc: After a successful Blunt attack, inflict 1 Fragile to a random enemy next Scene (once per Scene)

PassiveDesc.Name: Squeak… Squeak…?
PassiveDesc.Desc: On a successful Blunt attack, deal 1-2 bonus damage to target

PassiveDesc.Name: Oinkie!! Oink!!!
PassiveDesc.Desc: At the start of the Act, give 1 Feeble to two random enemies

PassiveDesc.Name: Unrelenting
PassiveDesc.Desc: Upon taking a lethal blow, reduce all incoming damage including what activated this passive by 25 for the Scene (Activates once per Act)

PassiveDesc.Name: Wedge
PassiveDesc.Desc: Pierce Dice Power +1

PassiveDesc.Name: Piercer
PassiveDesc.Desc: Pierce Damage +1

PassiveDesc.Name: Jolting Puncture
PassiveDesc.Desc: Pierce Stagger Damage +1

PassiveDesc.Name: Shimmering
PassiveDesc.Desc: At the start of each Scene, exhaust all pages in hand and deck; add new pages to hand. Their Cost becomes 0.

PassiveDesc.Name: Burning Passion
PassiveDesc.Desc: At the start of the Scene, inflict 3 Burn to all enemies if the character is not staggered.

PassiveDesc.Name: Unstable Shell of Ego
PassiveDesc.Desc: Regularly shifts between 'Feather Shield' and 'Searing Sword' modes, inflicting Burn after taking hits and upon attacking, respectively. Will use 'Blazing Strike' periodically.

PassiveDesc.Name: Sublimate
PassiveDesc.Desc: Dice gain +1 Power for every 5 stacks of Bleed on self.

PassiveDesc.Name: Twist Wound
PassiveDesc.Desc: Deal +1 Stagger damage against enemies with Bleed.

PassiveDesc.Name: Solidarity
PassiveDesc.Desc: At the end of the Scene, if all allies are alive, gain 1 Strength next Scene; if all other allies are dead, inflict 2 Feeble on self instead. This passive ability is only active if the Act started with one or more other allies.

PassiveDesc.Name: Overbreathing/Exhaustion
PassiveDesc.Desc: Restore 2 Light upon using a page whose original Cost is 4 or higher. A Speed die becomes unavailable.

PassiveDesc.Name: Deflect Assault
PassiveDesc.Desc: Once per Scene, respond to a one-sided attack with a Block die [Roll: 2-6]. (Not played in clashes where both characters use a Combat Page)

PassiveDesc.Name: Exhaustion
PassiveDesc.Desc: A Speed die becomes unavailable

PassiveDesc.Name: Eye of Death/Enervation
PassiveDesc.Desc: All dice gain +4 Power All dice lose 3 Power

PassiveDesc.Name: Enervation
PassiveDesc.Desc: Dice Power -3

PassiveDesc.Name: Singular Strike
PassiveDesc.Desc: When using a Combat Page with one non-Counter die, the die gains +2 Power, and it yields twice as many Emotion Points in a clash.

PassiveDesc.Name: Respiration
PassiveDesc.Desc: At the start of the Scene, restore 1 Light if current Light is 0

PassiveDesc.Name: Kizuna/Extreme Fatigue
PassiveDesc.Desc: After an ally dies, gain 1 Strength and 1 Endurance each Scene for the rest of the Act. (Stacks up to two times) Starts the battle with 75% less HP

PassiveDesc.Name: Extreme Fatigue
PassiveDesc.Desc: Starts the battle with 75% less HP

PassiveDesc.Name: Extreme Fatigue
PassiveDesc.Desc: Starts the battle with 50% less HP

PassiveDesc.Name: Kizuna/Extreme Fatigue
PassiveDesc.Desc: After an ally dies, gain 1 Strength and 1 Endurance each Scene for the rest of the Act. (Stacks up to two times) Starts the battle with 25% less HP

PassiveDesc.Name: Acceleration
PassiveDesc.Desc: When Speed is 5 or higher, deal +1 Stagger damage with attacks

PassiveDesc.Name: Concussion
PassiveDesc.Desc: On a successful Blunt attack, deal 2 bonus Stagger damage

PassiveDesc.Name: Puppet Skeleton
PassiveDesc.Desc: Blunt Dice Power +1

PassiveDesc.Name: Shimmering
PassiveDesc.Desc: At the start of each Scene, exhaust all pages in hand and deck; add new pages to hand. Their Cost becomes 0.

PassiveDesc.Name: Funambulism
PassiveDesc.Desc: When Emma and Noah are together, they cannot be staggered, and gain an additional Speed die. If their Stagger Resist falls to 0, Emma and Noah are separated at the end of the Scene.

PassiveDesc.Name: Lonesome Performance
PassiveDesc.Desc: When Noah is dead, all resistances change to "Fatal".

PassiveDesc.Name: High-level Acrobatics
PassiveDesc.Desc: When using a page whose original Cost is 3 or higher, all dice on that page gain +1 Power

PassiveDesc.Name: Lion’s Fist
PassiveDesc.Desc: Blunt Dice Power +1

PassiveDesc.Name: Bestride
PassiveDesc.Desc: At the end of the Scene, reunite with Emma

PassiveDesc.Name: Mind Hauler
PassiveDesc.Desc: Recover 2 Stagger Resist on a successful attack

PassiveDesc.Name: Health Hauler
PassiveDesc.Desc: Recover 2 HP on a successful attack

PassiveDesc.Name: Liquified Flesh
PassiveDesc.Desc: Defensive Dice Power +1

PassiveDesc.Name: Corpse Cleanup
PassiveDesc.Desc: When another character dies, recover 5% Max. HP at the end of that Scene (Max. 12)

PassiveDesc.Name: Corpse Cleanup
PassiveDesc.Desc: When another character dies, recover 20% Max. HP at the end of that Scene

PassiveDesc.Name: Grace of the Prescript
PassiveDesc.Desc: Each Scene, boost the Power of a random type of Offensive dice by +2

PassiveDesc.Name: Skim Prescript
PassiveDesc.Desc: Draw one more page at the start of the Act

PassiveDesc.Name: Quantum Leap
PassiveDesc.Desc: If Speed is 4 or higher, deal 13 bonus damage on successful hits at a 10% chance

PassiveDesc.Name: Refraction
PassiveDesc.Desc: On a successful hit, deal 13 bonus Stagger damage at a 5% chance

PassiveDesc.Name: Reaction Force
PassiveDesc.Desc: If the character did not use any pages for a Scene, gain 1 Strength and Endurance next Scene

PassiveDesc.Name: Dimensional Sections
PassiveDesc.Desc: On a successful hit, deal 10 bonus damage at a 10% chance

PassiveDesc.Name: Sooty Thwack
PassiveDesc.Desc: If the character has 'Smoke', boost Stagger damage dealt with attacks by (Smoke x 10)%

PassiveDesc.Name: Smoke Addiction
PassiveDesc.Desc: On a successful hit, if the target had 8 or more stacks of 'Smoke', inflict 2 Paralysis next Scene (Once per target per Scene)

PassiveDesc.Name: Stimulating Fumes
PassiveDesc.Desc: Once per Scene, if the character has 'Smoke', respond to a one-sided attack with a Block die [Roll: 1~(Smoke)]. (Not played in clashes where both characters use a Combat Page)

PassiveDesc.Name: Puffy Brume
PassiveDesc.Desc: 'Smoke' amplifies outgoing damage instead of incoming damage on this character

PassiveDesc.Name: Flaring Brand
PassiveDesc.Desc: Inflict 1-2 Burn on hit

PassiveDesc.Name: Plumed Escutcheon
PassiveDesc.Desc: When hit, inflict 1-2 Burn to attacker

PassiveDesc.Name: Volatile Passion
PassiveDesc.Desc: If target has Burn, boost the Power of Offensive dice by +1

PassiveDesc.Name: Shimmering
PassiveDesc.Desc: At the start of each Scene, exhaust all pages in hand and deck; add new pages to hand. Their Cost becomes 0.

PassiveDesc.Name: Separating Minds
PassiveDesc.Desc: Separates upon reaching 0 HP. All librarians restore 1 Light and 10 Stagger Resist afterwards.

PassiveDesc.Name: Separated Minds
PassiveDesc.Desc: Unites when all Children reach 0 HP. All librarians restore 1 Light and 10 Stagger Resist afterwards.

PassiveDesc.Name: Unseeing Child
PassiveDesc.Desc: Cannot see a portion of the information of Combat Pages used by the Crying Children. This ability is nullified when this character is Staggered.

PassiveDesc.Name: Unhearing Child
PassiveDesc.Desc: Cannot check or redirect the Crying Children's target. This ability is nullified when this character is Staggered.

PassiveDesc.Name: Unspeaking Child
PassiveDesc.Desc: A random librarian becomes Immobilized at the start of the Scene. This ability is nullified when this character is Staggered.

PassiveDesc.Name: A Precarious Mind
PassiveDesc.Desc: Becoming Staggered does not temporarily change the character's resistances. Instead, one of the Children plays a page with a die carrying the following effect: ‘[On Clash Lose] All resistances of all allies change to "Fatal".’

PassiveDesc.Name: Grasping Vulnerabilities
PassiveDesc.Desc: When attacking a target with a damage type they're "Weak" or "Fatal" to, deal +1 damage.

PassiveDesc.Name: Information Assessment
PassiveDesc.Desc: At the end of the Scene, a random enemy's resistance to a random damage type changes to "Normal" for the Scene. (Chosen from resistances that are "Endured" or "Normal")

PassiveDesc.Name: Seeing Through Weaknesses
PassiveDesc.Desc: If the character attacked an enemy last Scene with a damage type they're "Weak" to, and the enemy has 5 or more stacks of Fragile at the end of the Scene, their resistance against the type becomes "Fatal" for the rest of the Act.

PassiveDesc.Name: Swordplay of the Homeland
PassiveDesc.Desc: Slash Dice Power +2

PassiveDesc.Name: Carver of Scars
PassiveDesc.Desc: Offensive dice on the first Combat Page the character uses each Scene gain an additional effect: ‘[On Hit] Inflict 2 Bleed’

PassiveDesc.Name: Toughness
PassiveDesc.Desc: At Emotion Level 1 or above, gain 1 Protection and Stagger Protection at the start of the Scene. The amount increases to 2 at Emotion Level 3, and 3 at Emotion Level 5.

PassiveDesc.Name: Rupture Wound
PassiveDesc.Desc: Deal +3 damage against enemies with Bleed.

PassiveDesc.Name: Fervor
PassiveDesc.Desc: Offensive dice gain +1 Power at Emotion Level 3 or above

PassiveDesc.Name: A Fighter that Never Retreats
PassiveDesc.Desc: Whenever the Emotion Level rises, gain 1 Strength and Endurance

PassiveDesc.Name: Firm as a Great Mountain
PassiveDesc.Desc: Whenever the Emotion Level rises, recover 15% of Max HP(Max. 20)

PassiveDesc.Name: Remain Vigilant in Peace
PassiveDesc.Desc: Whenever the Emotion Level rises, recover 25% of Max Stagger Resist unless the character is staggered

PassiveDesc.Name: Ammo Supply
PassiveDesc.Desc: After every three successful attacks with Melee Combat Pages, add a random Ammunition to hand.

PassiveDesc.Name: The Boss’s Orders
PassiveDesc.Desc: At the start of the Scene, give 1 Protection to 2 random allies.

PassiveDesc.Name: Threefold Tenacity
PassiveDesc.Desc: Every third Offensive die gains +1 Power. Starting with the fourth Scene, all Offensive dice gain +1 Power instead.

PassiveDesc.Name: Grit
PassiveDesc.Desc: Reduce incoming damage and Stagger damage by 1 (Including damage from non-attacks)

PassiveDesc.Name: Empowered First Shot
PassiveDesc.Desc: When playing a Ranged Combat Page, its first Offensive die gains +1 Power.

PassiveDesc.Name: Additional Supplies
PassiveDesc.Desc: Every time the character exhausts 3 Ammunition, add a random Ammunition to hand at the end of the Scene.

PassiveDesc.Name: Emergency Resuscitation Protocol
PassiveDesc.Desc: Upon taking what would be a lethal blow, nullify the damage and spend all Charge to recover 5 HP per stack (Activates once per Act)

PassiveDesc.Name: Force Field
PassiveDesc.Desc: After spending Charge using a Combat Page, gain 1 Protection next Scene.

PassiveDesc.Name: Heavy-hearted Forte
PassiveDesc.Desc: Deal 1-2 Stagger damage to the opponent upon winning a clash.

PassiveDesc.Name: Charged Shield
PassiveDesc.Desc: At Emotion Level 2 or above, if the character gained Charge using Combat Pages in the previous Scene, gain 1 Endurance at the start of the Scene.

PassiveDesc.Name: Energy Discharge
PassiveDesc.Desc: At Emotion Level 2 or above, if the character spent Charge using Combat Pages in the previous Scene, gain 1 Strength at the start of the Scene.

PassiveDesc.Name: Shimmering
PassiveDesc.Desc: At the start of each Scene, exhaust all pages in hand and deck; add new pages to hand. Their Cost becomes 0.

PassiveDesc.Name: The Blue Reverberation
PassiveDesc.Desc: Take no damage from Ranged Combat Pages.

PassiveDesc.Name: Internal Combustion Engine
PassiveDesc.Desc: When gaining Smoke using Combat Pages, gain +1 additional stack.

PassiveDesc.Name: Meat Gear
PassiveDesc.Desc: The first Offensive die of each Combat Page deals +2-3 damage.

PassiveDesc.Name: Thought Gear
PassiveDesc.Desc: Evade Dice Power +1

PassiveDesc.Name: Shimmering
PassiveDesc.Desc: At the start of each Scene, exhaust all pages in hand and deck; add new pages to hand. Their Cost becomes 0.

PassiveDesc.Name: Proxy of the Index
PassiveDesc.Desc: On the second Scene, enter a 'Blade Unlocked' state regardless of condition.

PassiveDesc.Name: Shimmering
PassiveDesc.Desc: At the start of each Scene, exhaust all pages in hand and deck; add new pages to hand. Their Cost becomes 0.

PassiveDesc.Name: Proxy of the Index
PassiveDesc.Desc: On the second Scene, enter a 'Blade Unlocked' state regardless of condition.

PassiveDesc.Name: Shimmering
PassiveDesc.Desc: At the start of each Scene, exhaust all pages in hand and deck; add new pages to hand. Their Cost becomes 0.

PassiveDesc.Name: Proxy of the Index
PassiveDesc.Desc: On the second Scene, enter a 'Blade Unlocked' state regardless of condition.

PassiveDesc.Name: Locked Potential
PassiveDesc.Desc: After using six unique Combat Pages in a single Act, enter a 'Blade Unlocked' state, which boosts the Power of all dice by 1.

PassiveDesc.Name: Raging Torrent
PassiveDesc.Desc: Draw a page every time the character uses 4 unique Combat Pages.

PassiveDesc.Name: Breaking Pressure
PassiveDesc.Desc: In a clash, the opponent's Defensive dice lose 1 Power.

PassiveDesc.Name: Easygoing Breather
PassiveDesc.Desc: At Emotion Level 2 or above, each Scene, the Cost of a random Combat Page in hand whose Cost is 1 or higher is reduced by 1 for the Scene.

PassiveDesc.Name: Furious Fire Rending the Skies
PassiveDesc.Desc: At the start of the Scene, two random Combat Pages in hand gain the following effect: 'While this page is being used, inflict twice as much Burn with Combat Page abilities'.

PassiveDesc.Name: Force of a Wildfire
PassiveDesc.Desc: On a melee hit, inflict 1 Burn and 'Force of a Wildfire', a status that lasts 2 Scenes. If an enemy with 'Force of a Wildfire' is Staggered, inflict all other enemies with Burn equal to half of the amount of Burn that enemy had. (Rounded down)

PassiveDesc.Name: Hugging Fire, Sitting on Brushwood
PassiveDesc.Desc: When targets hit by melee attacks from this character take Burn damage at the end of the Scene they were attacked, they also take Stagger damage equal to half of the Burn damage.

PassiveDesc.Name: Kali
PassiveDesc.Desc: Restore 1 additional Light and draw 1 more page each Scene. When HP drops to 350, fully recover Stagger Resist and manifest E.G.O; HP cannot drop below 350 before this occurs. (Once per reception) After losing 'E.G.O Manifested' status, regain it in 3 Scenes. If the character enters a new Act after having manifested E.G.O this reception, manifest it on the second Scene.

PassiveDesc.Name: Legendary
PassiveDesc.Desc: Only Gebura can equip this. Unique E.G.O becomes accessible. At Emotion Level 4 or above, the Combat Page 'Manifest E.G.O' is added to hand. (Once per Act)

PassiveDesc.Name: Retaliate
PassiveDesc.Desc: Gain a Counter die (Slash, 4-8) at combat start.

PassiveDesc.Name: The Strongest
PassiveDesc.Desc: Choose the Speed dice with the lowest value; the Speed values of the dice change to the maximum possible value.

PassiveDesc.Name: The Red Mist
PassiveDesc.Desc: All dice gain +2 Power. Can use 'Great Split: Horizontal'. Each Scene, resistances against a random type become "Normal" while the rest are set to "Endured". For every enemy defeated, gain a stack of 'Red Mist', which boosts the Power of all dice. If the character fails to deal 40+ damage with attacks within a Scene, take Stagger damage equal to 40% of the Max. Stagger Resist. Lose 'E.G.O Manifested' status upon becoming Staggered.

PassiveDesc.Name: Binah
PassiveDesc.Desc: Has a unique Key page and Combat Pages that cannot be replaced or swapped.

PassiveDesc.Name: Incomplete Arbiter
PassiveDesc.Desc: At the start of the Scene, draw until 4 pages are in hand.

PassiveDesc.Name: The Red Mist
PassiveDesc.Desc: Can equip The Red Mist's Key page

PassiveDesc.Name: Triple-R Suit
PassiveDesc.Desc: Can store up to 20 Charges at once.

PassiveDesc.Name: Rabbit Augmentation
PassiveDesc.Desc: For every 30% of Max. HP lost this Act, gain 1 Haste at the start of each Scene. (Up to 3)

PassiveDesc.Name: Rhino Procedure
PassiveDesc.Desc: For every 30% of Max. HP lost this Act, gain 1 Endurance at the start of each Scene. (Up to 2)

PassiveDesc.Name: Reindeer Treatment
PassiveDesc.Desc: For every 30% of Max. HP lost this Act, gain 1 Strength at the start of each Scene. (Up to 2)

PassiveDesc.Name: The Commander
PassiveDesc.Desc: If the character has 11 or more Charge at the start of the Scene, give 1 Strength and Endurance to all allies.

PassiveDesc.Name: Finishing Touch
PassiveDesc.Desc: After using a Combat Page on a target, leave a 'mark' on them at the end of the Scene. The marked enemy takes 50% additional damage and Stagger damage from attacks. Only one enemy can be marked at a time.

PassiveDesc.Name: Compressed Charge-stimulated Muscleforce
PassiveDesc.Desc: If the character has 11 or more Charge at the start of the Scene, gain 1 Haste.

PassiveDesc.Name: Bionic Charge-synchronized Hull
PassiveDesc.Desc: If the character has 11 or more Charge at the start of the Scene, gain 2 Protection.

PassiveDesc.Name: Brainwave Charge-focusing Antlers
PassiveDesc.Desc: If the character has 11 or more Charge at the start of the Scene, deal +2 Stagger damage with attacks for the Scene.

PassiveDesc.Name: Myo’s Prowess
PassiveDesc.Desc: When using a Combat Page, all dice on the page gain Power against targets with slower Speed. (+1 Power per 2 points of difference, up to 5)

PassiveDesc.Name: Maximum Crash
PassiveDesc.Desc: If the character has 20 or more Charge at the start of the Scene, deal 50% more damage and Stagger damage with attacks; also receive 30% less damage and Stagger damage from attacks.

PassiveDesc.Name: Survivor
PassiveDesc.Desc: Every time the character recovers from Stagger, gain 1 Strength and Endurance at the start of the Scene for the rest of the Act. (Up to 5)

PassiveDesc.Name: Sufficient Ammo
PassiveDesc.Desc: Combat Pages whose default type is 'Ranged' do not exhaust on use.

PassiveDesc.Name: Manipulator of Odds
PassiveDesc.Desc: When a die this character plays rolls the minimum value, reroll it. Activates once per die.

PassiveDesc.Name: Changing Stances
PassiveDesc.Desc: Can assume one of the four stances: Slash, Pierce, Blunt, and Guard. A different deck can be set up for each stance. At the start of the Act, a random stance is selected; the stance can be changed by paying Light.

PassiveDesc.Name: Shimmering
PassiveDesc.Desc: At the start of each Scene, exhaust all pages in hand and deck; add new pages to hand. Fully restore Light each Scene.

PassiveDesc.Name: Dimension-walker
PassiveDesc.Desc: When HP drops to 350, forcefully end the Act and move to another floor. HP cannot drop below 350 before this occurs. (Once per reception)

PassiveDesc.Name: Changing Stances
PassiveDesc.Desc: At a regular interval, change the stance to one of the following: Slash, Pierce, Blunt, and Guard. After changing stances, dice of the type representing the current stance gain +1 Power for the Scene.

PassiveDesc.Name: Shimmering
PassiveDesc.Desc: At the start of each Scene, exhaust all pages in hand and deck; add new pages to hand. Their Cost becomes 0.

PassiveDesc.Name: Xiao
PassiveDesc.Desc: Becomes incapacitated once HP drops to 100.

PassiveDesc.Name: Shimmering
PassiveDesc.Desc: At the start of each Scene, exhaust all pages in hand and deck; add new pages to hand. Their Cost becomes 0.

PassiveDesc.Name: Shimmering
PassiveDesc.Desc: At the start of each Scene, exhaust all pages in hand and deck; add new pages to hand. Their Cost becomes 0.

PassiveDesc.Name: Nine Children of the Dragon
PassiveDesc.Desc: Dice Power +1. At the start of the Scene, inflict 2 Burn on all enemies.

PassiveDesc.Name: Pú Láo
PassiveDesc.Desc: When 'Pú Láo' is active, all characters are uninfluenced by any effect on Power for the Scene. 'Pú Láo' activates on the first Scene, and then activates every 2 Scenes.

PassiveDesc.Name: Reverse Scale
PassiveDesc.Desc: Every Scene, uses a Combat Page that deals Stagger damage to self but grants Strength if it loses in a clash. Stagger Resist is not fully recovered even if the character is restored from Stagger or an Act ends.

PassiveDesc.Name: Nine Children of the Dragon
PassiveDesc.Desc: If Emotion Level is 2 or higher at the end of the Scene, manifest E.G.O. The manifested E.G.O is enhanced if the character's Emotion Level is 4 or higher at the end of the Scene.

PassiveDesc.Name: Nine Children of the Dragon
PassiveDesc.Desc: Offensive Dice Power +1. Gain the passive ability 'Bā Xià'. The E.G.O is enhanced if the character's Emotion Level is 4 or higher at the end of the Scene.

PassiveDesc.Name: Nine Children of the Dragon
PassiveDesc.Desc: Dice Power +1. Gain the passive ability 'Bā Xià'. At the start of the Scene, inflict 2 Burn to all enemies. Has access to unique E.G.O.

PassiveDesc.Name: Bā Xià
PassiveDesc.Desc: Take no damage from Burn. When inflicted with a status ailment that isn't Burn, reduce the amount by half. (Rounded down, does not go below 1)

PassiveDesc.Name: Shimmering
PassiveDesc.Desc: At the start of each Scene, exhaust all pages in hand and deck; add new pages to hand. Their Cost becomes 0.

PassiveDesc.Name: Manus
PassiveDesc.Desc: Cannot be Staggered; cannot be defeated by depleting HP. Cannot act if HP is at 30 or lower at the start of the Scene. Destroyed when 얀샋ㄷ요무 is no longer present.

PassiveDesc.Name: Shimmering
PassiveDesc.Desc: At the start of each Scene, exhaust all pages in hand and deck; add new pages to hand. Their Cost becomes 0.

PassiveDesc.Name: 얀샋ㄷ요무
PassiveDesc.Desc: If this character's HP is at 301 or higher and the HP of all Hands are at 30 or lower, merge with the Hands. If this character's HP falls to 300 or lower while merged with the Hands, separate from the Hands at the end of the Scene; when separating, purge all status ailments and fully recover Stagger Resist.

PassiveDesc.Name: Distorted Blade
PassiveDesc.Desc: If the character is merged with the Hands or if the character's HP is at 300 or lower, use a Mass Attack at regular intervals. The Mass Attack is also used if the Act goes on for a large number of Scenes.

PassiveDesc.Name: 얀샋ㄷ요무
PassiveDesc.Desc: If the character has more (Red) Breakdown Abnormality pages than (Blue) Awakening pages, all dice gain +1 Power. If Breakdown pages outnumber Awakening pages by 2 or more, increase the damage and Stagger damage of Offensive dice by +1 in addition.

PassiveDesc.Name: The Messenger
PassiveDesc.Desc: Every Scene, gain a special Combat Page that can be used on allies. The type of Combat Page is randomly determined each Scene. At Emotion Level 3 or higher, the owner can pick one out of two random options instead. (There are four types of special Combat Pages with different functions: 'Give Strength', 'Give Protection and Stagger Protection', 'Page Draw', and 'Light Restoration'.)

PassiveDesc.Name: Apostle
PassiveDesc.Desc: Uncontrollable. This character cannot die, but once their HP falls to 1, cannot act until the Synchronization with WhiteNight is disengaged. The character will transform back into a librarian if no ally is synchronized with WhiteNight.

PassiveDesc.Name: Four Trigrams
PassiveDesc.Desc: Gain four special Combat Pages that benefit the user for the Scene they're used. Only one of the Four Trigrams' pages can be played per Scene, and once a Four Trigrams' page is used, it cannot be reused until all four have been utilized.

PassiveDesc.Name: Hana for All
PassiveDesc.Desc: When gaining Strength, Endurance, Protection, or Stagger Protection through Combat Pages: give the same status effect to a random other ally as well.

PassiveDesc.Name: All for Hana
PassiveDesc.Desc: If the character took damage from attacks on the previous Scene, change this character's resistances against the type that dealt the most damage to "Endured" for the Scene. (Applies separately for physical and Stagger damage)

PassiveDesc.Name: The Twelve Fixers
PassiveDesc.Desc: Boost the *minimum* roll value of all dice by +2. At Emotion Level 3 or higher, also boost the *maximum* roll value of all dice by +1.

PassiveDesc.Name: Duel
PassiveDesc.Desc: Immune to Immobilization. The opponent gains bonus Max HP and Max Stagger Resist.

PassiveDesc.Name: Orlando
PassiveDesc.Desc: Has a unique Key page and Combat Pages that cannot be replaced or swapped.

PassiveDesc.Name: The Black Silence
PassiveDesc.Desc: Draw 2 additional pages at the start of the Act. All dice on every third Combat Page used gain +2 Power.

PassiveDesc.Name: Resonance
PassiveDesc.Desc: When using a Melee Combat Page, if the difference between this character's Speed and the target's Vibration is 1 or less, all dice on the page gain +2 Power. At the start of the Act, draw 2 pages.

PassiveDesc.Name: Overheat
PassiveDesc.Desc: While the character has burn, Offensive dice gain +1 Power.

PassiveDesc.Name: Masterful Smoker
PassiveDesc.Desc: When using a Combat Page with an effect involving 'Smoke', all dice on the page gain +1 Power.

PassiveDesc.Name: Prep Up the Main Dish
PassiveDesc.Desc: When using a Melee Combat Page, if target has Bleed, Offensive dice on the page gain +1~2 Power.

PassiveDesc.Name: Neigh~! Woof-woof! Bawk!
PassiveDesc.Desc: On hit with a Melee Combat Page, activate one of the following effects (each effect activates once per Scene): - Inflict 1 Feeble next Scene - Inflict 1 Paralysis next Scene - Deal 2 Stagger damage to target - Recover 2 Stagger Resist

PassiveDesc.Name: Splendid Performance
PassiveDesc.Desc: When using a Combat Page with 3 or more different types of non-Counter dice, all dice on the page gain +1 Power and deal +1 damage.

PassiveDesc.Name: Guts
PassiveDesc.Desc: Upon taking what would be a lethal blow, nullify the damage and recover 100 HP; at the end of the Scene this happens, fully restore Stagger Resist. (Once per reception)

PassiveDesc.Name: Puppet Strings
PassiveDesc.Desc: At the start of the Act, add a special Combat Page that can give 'Puppeteer’s Strings' to another ally to hand. The character with 'Puppeteer’s Strings' gains 1 Strength or Endurance at the start of each Scene, and their HP won't go below 1. If the HP of the character with 'Puppeteer’s Strings' reaches 1 or if the character with this passive ability is no longer present, 'Puppeteer’s Strings' is lost at the end of the Scene.

PassiveDesc.Name: Bloodfiendish
PassiveDesc.Desc: On hit, recover 2 HP. If the character recovered 3 or more HP in a single Scene, gain 1 Strength next Scene.

PassiveDesc.Name: Contracts
PassiveDesc.Desc: At the start of the Act, add Unsigned Contracts to the hands of all allies. If a character fulfills the condition stated by the Unsigned Contract in their hand, its effect will be granted, and the Contract will exhaust. It is possible to exchange Unsigned Contracts with another ally.

PassiveDesc.Name: Shimmering
PassiveDesc.Desc: At the start of each Scene, exhaust all pages in hand and deck; add new pages to hand. Their Cost becomes 0.

PassiveDesc.Name: Shimmering
PassiveDesc.Desc: At the start of each Scene, exhaust all pages in hand and deck; add new pages to hand. Their Cost becomes 0.

PassiveDesc.Name: Retaliate
PassiveDesc.Desc: Gain 2 dice (Slash, 4-8) at combat start.

PassiveDesc.Name: Clenched Grudge
PassiveDesc.Desc: Recover 5 Stagger Resist on hit; lose 8 Stagger Resist on clash lose.

PassiveDesc.Name: The Black Silence
PassiveDesc.Desc: All dice on the page selected in the third Speed dice slot gain +2 Power.

PassiveDesc.Name: Speed Ⅲ
PassiveDesc.Desc: Speed Dice Slot +1. Gain an additional Speed die at Emotion Level 3.

PassiveDesc.Name: The Hatching Dead
PassiveDesc.Desc: When a Smoldering Byproduct is defeated, spawn one to replace it next Scene and lose 50 HP. (Once per unit) No Smoldering Byproducts will be spawned if the character has 300 or less HP.

PassiveDesc.Name: Wielder of Suffocating Haze
PassiveDesc.Desc: When attacking, if target has Suffocating Haze, deal +2 damage. When hit, if attacker has Suffocating Haze, take 2 less damage.

PassiveDesc.Name: Shimmering
PassiveDesc.Desc: At the start of each Scene, exhaust all pages in hand and deck; add new pages to hand. Their Cost becomes 0.

PassiveDesc.Name: Shimmering
PassiveDesc.Desc: At the start of each Scene, exhaust all pages in hand and deck; add new pages to hand. Their Cost becomes 0.

PassiveDesc.Name: Soulmates
PassiveDesc.Desc: Speed Dice Slots +2. Gain Soul Link for 3 Scenes, with a 2-Scene interval. While Soul Link is up, gain 3 additional Speed dice. If both Roland and Angelica are Staggered, Soul Link is delayed by 1 Scene.

PassiveDesc.Name: Linked Souls
PassiveDesc.Desc: If Soul Link is lowered to 0 before it expires, the character's damage resistances change to "Normal" and Stagger damage resistances to "Fatal" for the next 2 Scenes, and is inflicted with 3 Paralysis. Otherwise, recover HP and Stagger Resist when Soul Link expires, and set the amount to that of the character with the higher HP.

PassiveDesc.Name: Request Target
PassiveDesc.Desc: While Soul Link is up, the first three Speed dice target the librarian with the lowest current HP.

PassiveDesc.Name: Dark Mark
PassiveDesc.Desc: When without a Soul Link, prioritize targeting the librarian who has a 'Dark Mark'. Offensive dice gain +3 Power against the marked target.

PassiveDesc.Name: Dearly Departing
PassiveDesc.Desc: When Angelica dies, enter a state of Rampage and use a different set of Combat Pages.

PassiveDesc.Name: Shimmering
PassiveDesc.Desc: At the start of each Scene, exhaust all pages in hand and deck; add new pages to hand. Their Cost becomes 0.

PassiveDesc.Name: Request Target
PassiveDesc.Desc: While Soul Link is up, the first three Speed dice target the librarian with the lowest current HP.

PassiveDesc.Name: Dark Mark
PassiveDesc.Desc: On the third Scene of Soul Link being maintained, leave a 'Dark Mark' on the character that engaged this character last.

PassiveDesc.Name: Dearly Parting
PassiveDesc.Desc: When Roland dies, become Grief-stricken and use a different set of Combat Pages.

PassiveDesc.Name: Shimmering
PassiveDesc.Desc: At the start of each Scene, exhaust all pages in hand and deck; add new pages to hand. Their Cost becomes 0. Take half as much damage from status ailments.

PassiveDesc.Name: Memories of the Library
PassiveDesc.Desc: For the duration of the phase, gain unique passive abilities each Scene. HP does not go below 40%. If Roland's HP is at 40% at the end of the Scene, proceed to the next phase. Fully recover Stagger Resist when progressing to the next phase.

PassiveDesc.Name: Scars
PassiveDesc.Desc: Reduce incoming damage from a specific type, which changes every Scene. When hit by the attack of the type, reduce its damage to 0 at a 20% chance. This effect can be nullified by destroying the weapons summoned by Roland.

PassiveDesc.Name: Blood
PassiveDesc.Desc: Defensive dice gain 1-2 Power this Scene. If a Defensive die loses in a clash, take 3-6 Stagger damage.

PassiveDesc.Name: Leer
PassiveDesc.Desc: Gain 1 Strength this Scene. Strength gain increases by 1 whenever this effect activates. If an Offensive die fails to deal damage, take 3-6 Stagger damage.

PassiveDesc.Name: Curiosity
PassiveDesc.Desc: For this Scene, on hit, shuffle two random pages in target's hand back into their deck.

PassiveDesc.Name: Kiss
PassiveDesc.Desc: Prioritizes targeting librarians with Bind. For this Scene, on clash win, inflict Ice Splinter to the opponent. At the end of the Scene, characters with 3 or more Ice Splinters become Immobilized for the next Scene.

PassiveDesc.Name: Shimmering
PassiveDesc.Desc: At the start of each Scene, exhaust all pages in hand and deck; add new pages to hand. Their Cost becomes 0.

PassiveDesc.Name: Scattering Fragments of Recollection
PassiveDesc.Desc: At the beginning of the phase, four Images of the Bygones are summoned, each with different abilities.

PassiveDesc.Name: Engraved Spite
PassiveDesc.Desc: If this remains by the end of the Scene, it is nailed to the ground. The last die of the Combat Page used on the fifth Scene is recycled once for each weapon on the ground.

PassiveDesc.Name: Image of the Bygones
PassiveDesc.Desc: Speed Dice Slot +1. Does not gain Speed dice from Emotion Level bonuses. At the start of each Scene, exhaust all pages in hand and deck; add new pages to hand. Their Cost becomes 0.

PassiveDesc.Name: Pulsation
PassiveDesc.Desc: Speed Dice Slot -1. On hit, give 1 Strength to all allies next Scene. If the character couldn't deal any damage using Offensive dice by the end of the Scene, take Stagger damage.

PassiveDesc.Name: Aspiration
PassiveDesc.Desc: Max HP is increased by 15%. Gain 1-2 Speed.

PassiveDesc.Name: Fervent Beats
PassiveDesc.Desc: This character dies at the end of the third Scene after which it was summoned. Gain 2 Strength and Endurance, 3 Haste, and 4 Protection each Scene until death. All Stagger damage resistances change to "Ineffective". Max HP is lowered by 50%.

PassiveDesc.Name: Learn
PassiveDesc.Desc: Uses the Combat Page 'Learn' for all Speed dice. If this character's attack hits, it inflicts a 'Lies' status which changes the Costs of pages at random next Scene.

PassiveDesc.Name: Shimmering
PassiveDesc.Desc: At the start of each Scene, exhaust all pages in hand and deck; add new pages to hand. Their Cost becomes 0.

PassiveDesc.Name: Shimmering
PassiveDesc.Desc: At the start of each Scene, exhaust all pages in hand and deck; add new pages to hand. Their Cost becomes 0. Does not gain Speed dice from Emotion Level bonuses.

PassiveDesc.Name: Showtime~
PassiveDesc.Desc: At the end of the Scene, all librarians take 2-4 Stagger damage. Prioritizes targeting the librarian with the lowest current Stagger Resist.

PassiveDesc.Name: I Can Shrug That Off!
PassiveDesc.Desc: Cannot lose more than 50% of Max HP in a single Scene.

PassiveDesc.Name: Farewell…!
PassiveDesc.Desc: Whenever an ally dies, takes 50 Stagger damage.

PassiveDesc.Name: The End of the Show
PassiveDesc.Desc: Upon death, all librarians fully restore Stagger Resist, and all status ailments on them are halved.

PassiveDesc.Name: Twas a Joy to Perform by Your Side…!
PassiveDesc.Desc: Upon death, Oswald takes 70 Stagger damage. (Oswald still takes damage even if he's out of combat)

PassiveDesc.Name: Twas a Joy to Perform by Your Side…!
PassiveDesc.Desc: Upon death, Oswald takes 70 Stagger damage. (Oswald still takes damage even if he's out of combat)

PassiveDesc.Name: Twas a Joy to Perform by Your Side…!
PassiveDesc.Desc: Upon death, Oswald takes 70 Stagger damage. (Oswald still takes damage even if he's out of combat)

PassiveDesc.Name: Amalgamation
PassiveDesc.Desc: If spawned by the effects of 'Red Strings', Max HP increases by 20 per character that was conjoined, and gains the passive abilities of the librarians conjoined.

PassiveDesc.Name: Entangled Strings
PassiveDesc.Desc: When a die each ally plays rolls the minimum value, reroll it. Activates once per die. At the start of the Scene, a random librarian is inflicted with 2 Bind. At the start of the Scene when 'Straining Strings' is used, all 'Puppet Strings' are removed.

PassiveDesc.Name: Unbound Flesh
PassiveDesc.Desc: After death, all librarians gain 1-3 Haste at the start of each Scene, and all of their dice gain +1 Power for the rest of the Act.

PassiveDesc.Name: Fierce Sandstorm
PassiveDesc.Desc: At the end of the Scene, all librarians take 3-5 damage. Jae-heon's Offensive dice gain '[On Hit] Inflict 1 Bleed'.

PassiveDesc.Name: Violent Sandstorm
PassiveDesc.Desc: After death, all librarians deal +3 damage with attacks for the rest of the Act.

PassiveDesc.Name: Burning Resolve to Fight On
PassiveDesc.Desc: If there are no other allies present at the end of the Scene, gain 1 Strength and Endurance, and gain 2 Speed dice for the rest of the Act.

PassiveDesc.Name: Perception-blocking Mask
PassiveDesc.Desc: A Speed die with the lowest Speed becomes untargetable.

PassiveDesc.Name: Gebura’s Prowess
PassiveDesc.Desc: When using a Combat Page, all dice on the page gain Power against targets with slower Speed. (+1 Power per 2 points of difference, up to 5)

PassiveDesc.Name: An Arbiter
PassiveDesc.Desc: At the start of the Scene, draw until 5 pages are in hand.

PassiveDesc.Name: Weariness
PassiveDesc.Desc: Starts the battle with 25% less HP

PassiveDesc.Name: Mercy
PassiveDesc.Desc: Offensive dice gain +1 Power against targets with less than 10% HP.

PassiveDesc.Name: Stiletto
PassiveDesc.Desc: Pierce Dice Power +2, Blunt and Slash Dice Power -2.

PassiveDesc.Name: Chink in One’s Armor
PassiveDesc.Desc: When using a Melee Combat Page, if this character's Speed is greater than the target's by 3 or more, destroy a Block die the target has.

PassiveDesc.Name: Bottom Deal
PassiveDesc.Desc: If the character discards a page, draw 1 page at the start of the next Scene.

PassiveDesc.Name: Stacking the Deck
PassiveDesc.Desc: If the character discards a page, restore 1 Light at the end of the Scene.

PassiveDesc.Name: Mirage
PassiveDesc.Desc: At the end of the Scene, recover half of the Stagger damage taken during the Scene. (Minimum of 1; does not activate while Staggered)

PassiveDesc.Name: Hawk's Eye
PassiveDesc.Desc: At the end of the Scene, give 2 Protection to the ally that suffered the most damage.

PassiveDesc.Name: Haboob
PassiveDesc.Desc: Once per Scene, after suffering a one-sided attack, gain 1 Protection and Stagger Protection next Scene.

PassiveDesc.Name: Insurance Benefits
PassiveDesc.Desc: If the character suffered 1 or more one-sided attacks in a Scene, restore 1 Light.

PassiveDesc.Name: Policy Form
PassiveDesc.Desc: At the end of the Scene, remove all stacks of a random status ailment (Feeble, Disarm, or Bind) that would be inflicted to the character next Scene.

PassiveDesc.Name: Life Insurance
PassiveDesc.Desc: Untransferable. At the end of the Scene, if the character has 30% or less HP, add a copy of 'Life Insurance' to hand.

PassiveDesc.Name: Smoke Overflow
PassiveDesc.Desc: At the end of the Scene, if the character has 8 or more Smoke, gain 1 Strength next Scene.

PassiveDesc.Name: Excess Supply
PassiveDesc.Desc: If the character has 10 or more Smoke, deal +3 damage with attacks.

PassiveDesc.Name: Immediate Repairs
PassiveDesc.Desc: When Staggered, recover from Stagger and fully recover Stagger Resist (Once per Act).

PassiveDesc.Name: Madness
PassiveDesc.Desc: At the start of the Scene, gain one of the following effects: - 2 Strength - 2 Haste - 2 Endurance - 5 Fragile

PassiveDesc.Name: Offensive Position
PassiveDesc.Desc: At the start of the Scene, inflict 3 Fragile to self and gain 1 Strength.

PassiveDesc.Name: Psych Up
PassiveDesc.Desc: Restore 1 Light and draw 1 page at the end of the Scene if the character did not use any pages.

PassiveDesc.Name: Readied Position
PassiveDesc.Desc: If the character suffered 'Immobilization' on the previous Scene, gain 1 Strength, 2 Protection, and 2 Stagger Protection.

PassiveDesc.Name: Ready for a Breakthrough
PassiveDesc.Desc: Every 3 Scenes, uses the Combat Page 'Pinpoint Breakthrough'.

PassiveDesc.Name: Acrobatic
PassiveDesc.Desc: Ranged Attack Damage +1
